page.title: 09Day in the life of my family
page.content: ------Saturday June 1st PM------ At 1.00pm we went home and my mother fed Elizabeth and my dad went to play cricket in Neath. After Elizabeth had been fed and changed, we went to a fete with my Auntie at Killay Childrens home. At the fete I won a money box and a belt, then I had a hotdog. At 4.30pm the fete ended. When we arrived home my mother fed Elizabeth and then she went to sleep. At 5.30pm my aunt and uncle called around with my two younger cousin Cathy and Gareth. My dad came home from cricket at 7.30pm. We set the table for tea and then at 8.30pm we had tea. After tea my brother and I went upstairs to play. At 9.30pm I started to do my homework. After doing my homework I went to bed at 10.30pm.
